message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
